name: Nour (itch)
description:
Made during Global Game Jam 2020 as part of team "La Famiz". I was in charge of writing, overall storytelling, and some scripting. Also de-facto producer! We all collaborated on the game design. 

Nour returns to her hometown of Aleppo in Syria. She hasn't been back since childhood when her family immigrated to America. Her memories are fading away, and with them, her sense of self. She yearns to remember her time here and, at the same time, feel whole again. Help Nour repair her sense of self. Discover items to help trigger her memory by exploring the ruins of the city.

  • Arrows to move left and right.
